text.textblock: Pursuant to section 10(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, 5 U.S.C., appendix I), notice is hereby given for Special Committee 182 meeting to be held March 8-9, starting at 9 a.m. The meeting will be held at the RTC Conference Room, 1140 Connecticut Avenue, NW., Suite 1020, Washington, DC 20036.

The agenda for this meeting is as follows: (1) Chairman's introductory remarks; (2) Review and approval of meeting agenda; (3) Review committee terms of reference, RTCA Paper No. 12-94/TMC-117 (enclosed); (4) Identify goals, develop work program and examine milestones; (5) Assign tasks; (6) Other business; (7) Date and place of next meeting.

Attendance is open to the interested public but limited to space available. With the approval of the Chairman, members of the public may present oral statements at the meeting. Persons wishing to present statements or obtain information should contact the RTCA Secretariat, 1140 Connecticut Avenue, NW., suite 1020, Washington, DC 20036; (202) 833-9339. Any member of the public may present a written statement to the committee at any time.
Issued in Washington, DC, on February 2, 1994.

doctitle.textblock: RTCA, Inc., Special Committee 182; Minimum Operational Performance Standard for an Avionics Computer Resource; Meeting
